templeName: Shri Dattapaduka of Shri Kshetra Bachani, Jagrat Sthan
placeSubHeading: Location: 23-25 km south of Kolhapur, 23-25 km south of Vispurli, left Hatala, Gaargoti road, 'Kagal' taluk, 'Bachni' village.
placeRighteous: Kagal is the village of P.P. Yogiraj Gulvani Maharaj.
placeMahatmya: Special: 'Shri Dattapaduka' at 'Bachani' is as dazzling as Nrusinghwadi and fulfills the wishes of the devotees.
